Name: Talismania Deluxe
About the game: King Midas accidentally turned his own daughter into gold! And the only hope he has to change her back is to use his special powers to perform acts of goodness instead of greed. That's where you come in. Help Midas connect magical talismans to release gold coins and help the poor. If you help enough people, the god Zeus will change Midas' daughter back to her old self.
